LanguageHaskell2010

Config

Description

The module exposes a datatype for a Configuration file. The file must be in JSON format. If the file does not exist the module will cause a runtime exception and crash the program. Thus be sure that :set args is set to prod or dev, and the json file exists in the system path .srcconfig/cofnig.json for dev.

Synopsis
  • data Configuration = Configuration {
    • dbName :: Text
    • dbUrl :: String
    • dbUser :: String
    • dbPassword :: String
    }
  • configuration :: IO (Maybe Configuration)
